rows.label: tlk43420171_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard that the streets of Acedia are as
beautiful as a work of art. I'm here
from Invidia for sightseeing.

rows.label: tlk43420171_01_msg0002
rows.name:
The cathedral is majestic and the
streets are laid out beautifully...

rows.label: tlk43420171_01_msg0003
rows.name:
But the refugee camp...
Well, I suppose there's not much that
can be done about it...

rows.label: tlk43420171_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Despite all the help they get, they still
say they're against Blades? Perhaps
they should consider moving on then.
